item.title: 【BLU-RAY】BLU-RAY - Blackpink - The Show (2021) Blu Ray 1080i
item.description:
BLACKPiNK
Olympic Park Gymnastics Arena
Seoul, South Korea
Recorded: Jan 31, 2021
Released: Jun 1, 2021

Setlist

01. OPENING VCR
02. KILL THIS LOVE
03. CRAZY OVER YOU
04. MENT #1
05. HOW YOU LIKE THAT
06. BRIDGE VCR #1
07. DON’T KNOW WHAT TO DO
08. 불장난 (PLAYING WITH FIRE)
09. LOVESICK GIRLS
10. LOVE TO HATE ME
11. YOU NEVER KNOW
12. SOLO
13. GONE
14. BRIDGE VCR #2
15. PRETTY SAVAGE
16. 뚜두뚜두 (DDU-DU DDU-DU)
17. BRIDGE VCR #3
18. 휘파람 (WHISTLE)
19. 마지막처럼 (AS IF IT’S YOUR LAST)
20. 붐바야 (BOOMBAYAH)
21. MENT #2
22. BRIDGE VCR #4
23. FOREVER YOUNG
24. MENT #3 + OUTRO
25. ENDING VCR






General
